name: Codedoor
description: In Codedoor, a unique horror puzzle game, you're in an abandoned area with containers, each locked with a random code. Find the right one using the code given to you to survive and advance. Exciting, strategic, and ever-changing challenges await!

name: Code5erpent
description: The game where numbers are a weapon. On a simulated Earth, add, multiply, or combine the numbers which comprise the matrix's code, and take advantage of a rich equipment system of weapons and scrolls in order to come up with devastating combos to annihilate your enemies.

name: Clutter Puzzle Magazine Vol. 15 No. 1: Collector's Edition
description: By far, the most challenging and exciting Clutter ever. More fun and challenging than even Clutter RefleXIVe. You will not believe the Spot The Differences Puzzles. And wait until you see the Eyeballs!!!

name: Corridor
description: Strategically maneuver ships about the 3D space in this unique turn-based tactics roguelike.

name: Cooked Out
description: Dive into Cooked Out! Battle in whimsical kitchens as a quirky eggplant. Use headbutts, dodge hazards, grab boosters, and outwit rivals in this hilarious, action-packed party game. Download now for non-stop culinary chaos and multiplayer fun!

name: Cyber Strike
description: Cyber Strike is a butt clenching bullet hell dungeon crawler. Navigate through intense shootouts, strategic dodges, and cybernetic boss battles. Save a digital world from viruses and virtual foes. Rewrite destiny as you save cyber space in this thrilling adventure.

name: Daedalus
description: Choose your champion and enter the Labyrinth, survive if you can. Hades has taken over the Labyrinth, forcing souls through an arduous trial to reach the afterlife. Do you have what it takes to succeed, or will you be doomed to guard the Labyrinth for eternity?

name: Grotto King
description: Brave the dungeon filled with monsters and treasures of all sizes. Grotto King is a short first-person action game made for beginners and gurus alike.

name: Danger Ramps
description: Danger Ramps is a 3D platformer driving game. Master the control of your vehicle to advance through colorful environments, collecting stars without flipping over or falling into abysses.

name: Death ring
description: This is a fun casual shooting game where players will need to control the Pea Shooter to fire from an appropriate angle and defeat enemies from all directions. Some of them have exceptional combat power, while others have very fast movement and attack speeds.

name: Degu Squad
description: Important personnel were kidnapped by terrorists. When no one dared to come forward, the Degu Squad received the rescue plan. The special operations team of more than a dozen people needs perfect cooperation to complete such an arduous task. Are you ready?

name: Dense forest
description: In this game, you have a fairly simple task - to collect all the fruits to complete the level

name: Descent
description: Mythology based bunnyhopping FPS with various movement mechanics.

name: Desktop Tourney World
description: Desktop Tourney World is a simulation construction, immortal cultivation survival game, you need to collect food, construct buildings, build equipment, and fight with all kinds of monsters.

name: Deep Dark Space
description: Deep Dark Space is a 4 player online co-op horror game in space. Investigate abandoned stations to collect evidence and deduce the monster. Beware betrayal from the team!

name: Underminer
description: Welcome to Underminer, an underground adventure game set in a subterranean world. Mine minerals, earn money, upgrade your drill machine and descend deeper into the earth. The truth about 'legendary minerals' and an exciting underground world are waiting for you!

name: TV Studio Story
description: Create shows, sign stars, and dominate the airwaves in this TV studio sim.

name: Virtue
description: A customizable event display for collider experiments for desktop or virtual reality. Explore electron-proton collisions in the ePIC detector at the future Electron-Ion Collider, or upload your own detector geometry and collision data to be animated.

name: Virtual girl save virtual boy
description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: VHHS: Backrooms
description: VHHS:Backrooms is a psychological horror game with a storyline. The first game in the Volter series. In this part you have to control the fate of a scientist, who got into the world of backstage for some circumstances. His life completely depends on you.

name: Velkyn
description: Embark on a unique journey and uncover the secrets of the floating island of Vynary and other locations. Velkyn is an immersive open world adventure with a focus on combat, exploration, and puzzles.

name: Virtu-Pilot
description: Get ready for take-off, cadet! Enter an immersive UE5 experience that will elevate your light aircraft procedure skills. Master preliminary checks, interior/exterior startup checks, and gain the confidence to soar. Planned features: AI instructors, multiplayer and radio communications training.

name: Visagens
description: Visagens is an action-focused, 2D side-scroller shooter. Ispired by games like Sunset Riders and Castlevania. Play as Bento, a blind cowboy, armed with a mysterious gun and supernatural powers. In a quest to Cleanse the lands from the demonic scourge of the Visagens and avenge his family.

name: Vivian and Kyuma
description: A short visual novel featuring elements inspired by the Princess and the Frog with a cultivation twist. Spend time with a cute little snake and have some fun together as you make decisions to determine the fate of a young goddess.

name: The Void Between
description: When one man's dream holiday turns into a nightmare, it's up to you save him from himself... VOID is an FMV style puzzle game that leads you through a labyrinth of mysterious challenges and puzzling obstacles. Can you uncover the keys that will unlock your freedom, or seal your fate...

name: Void Inside
description: Void Inside is a first-person psychological horror that immerses you in a supernatural reality. Remotely resembling the human world, this place is filled with horrifying entities incomprehensible to the human mind. Your goal is to survive and maintain your sanity

name: Voids Vigil
description: Blast your way through robotic hordes in this auto-battler arena shooter. Use auto-firing guns and drones, timely dashes and special abilities to reach The Void where a randomly constructed final Conservator awaits convergence. Spend your Cogs wisely among the shops to create unique builds!

name: Void Wars
description: Dodge, shoot and free the galaxy of the evil space mega corp. Use a variety of different weapons and spaceships, each with different playstyles to overcome many challenging levels.

name: Vox Battles
description: Get ready for a blast in Vox Battles, a multiplayer mayhem of fast-paced fights and clever strategy. Choose a Vox champion and dive into an arena with up to 8 players, hunt for weapons to survive. With 3 unique biomes, Vox Battles is where casual meets competition, all in one fantastic showdown!

name: VR Dinosaur Village
description: This is an exciting VR casual game that allows players to experience the fun of dinosaur breeding in person. In this virtual real world, you will become a dinosaur farmeter to cultivate huge dinosaurs and earn money by planting plants and fishing and feeding dinosaurs.

name: VR Houses: Glass Apartment
description: VR Houses: Glass Apartment is a groundbreaking experience where photorealism takes center stage. Step beyond the borders of traditional VR games and immerse yourself in a hyper-realistic digital environment.

name: The Tour
description: The Deepening solar system tour is incoming and Jon and his band need to get back in sync. Join them on a tour around the country as they learn their new songs, rock the crowd, and build up the hype for their spacefaring tour.

name: The Tale of (Your Name)
description: Embark on a procedurally generated dungeon, make choices to craft your own narrative. Select your hero and confront monsters, solve puzzles, and make decisions that shape your unique story as you play.

name: The Street 10
description: Caught in an infinite alley, look for Street 10 to find your way out.

name: The Skirmish
description: Fight in online battles for one of two teams or play with bots.

name: The Seven Betrayers
description: This is a pixelated casual action game, the adventure of finding the seven betrayers, in which you collect the fruits of plants to strengthen yourself, defeat monsters to find the betrayers, and finally leave this continent for a new world!

name: The Road of Heroes
description: A game for rapidly shaping heroes, featuring randomized equipment attributes and combat maps. After leveling up, you can customize attribute enhancements and learn skills of your choice, with the goal of defeating bosses upon entering combat.

name: Thousands of Heroes
description: This game is a roguelike where item management is crucial. Since almost all items have a limited number of uses, the choice of whether to use or save each item becomes important. You can also cooperate with other users by sharing dungeon IDs!

name: Thin Way
description: Thin Way is an exciting platformer that combines parkour and intense fights. You are an experienced traceur in a world where towering skyscrapers, crowded high-rises, and abandoned buildings create a unique playground for your art. No opponent will halt you and no obstacle will slowdown your path

name: They Who Dwell Below
description: They Who Dwell Below is an exploration horror game set within the crumbling ruins of a lost dwarven city. The player is tasked with escaping the long abandoned vestige and along the way uncovering the truth of its fall. But be wary, spirits are not all that haunt these ancient halls.

name: They Came From Venus
description: You are alone at your uncles remote mountain estate, when a mysterious package gets delivered to his doorstep. Soon after, things get out of hand and the house becomes your last bastion of survival.

name: The Valley of the Architects
description: A puzzle game, narratively grounded around architecture, adventure and elevators. Follow architectural writer Liz on a journey through Africa to uncover the secrets of a lost and forgotten Architect. Using your problem solving skills, overcome each puzzle and slowly unwrap the story of a lifetime.

name: The World Has Gone
description: The World Has Gone—a fast-paced zombie shooter couch-co-op game!

name: Tidebound
description: Tidebound is a fishing and inventory management game with a relaxing, casual atmosphere. Catch, sell, upgrade your boat, and sail further to catch more expensive and exotic sea animals. Casual yet engaging, the game offers a sense of progress with tons of equipment and hundreds of species to catch.

name: Tilted Tennis
description: A competitive paddle and ball game, with a twist! As you hit the ball around the arena, the camera follows it. Spin the ball to disorient your friends and win the match, but take care not to lose track of which way is up yourself...

name: The Moon 2044
description: Explore a secret NCIS facility and discover its dark secret. Take on the role of the XV-11 unit and face hundreds of enemies in a dark sci-fi shooter inspired by old school hits!

name: Kanto Expansion Pak
description: The Kanto Expansion Pak is a ROM hack of Pokémon Red that expands the chromatic generation with scrapped Pokémon, regional variants, and cross-gen evolutions. It attempts to remain as faithful as possible to the game's design specification while doing this, ensuring that RBY OU does not deviate significantly from its roots. Thus, it doesn't include generational gimmicks like Mega Evolution, it simply aims to port what is technically possible in a vanilla Gen 1. It also aims to be compatible with any Gen 1 metagame, allowing tiers like Monotype, LC, NFE, Nintendo Cups, and more to be at least playable for the average user. The original Pokémon are left completely unchanged and balanced around.

name: Imposter The Horror
description: Welcome to Imposter The Horror. It will connect you to yourself with its atmosphere and mechanics.

name: Suugaku Riki-ou: Shokyuu Chuu-1 Level
description: Sin descripción

name: Paku Paku
description: Available for free, Paku Paku is a proposal that transfers the action of Pac-Man to a one-dimensional maze of a single line with 16 points. In it, the goal of the protagonist (six pixels tall) is to eat points while avoiding the red ghost, an enemy that moves faster than you

name: PJ Masks Power Heroes: Mighty Alliance
description: Team up with the Power Heroes and rebuild PJ Power HQ.

name: Outcast: A New Beginning - Adelpha Edition
description:
Key items of the Outcast - A New Beginning: Adelpha Edition

High-detail 24cm/9.5inch Sai statue
Exclusive collector's steelbook
Game copy
3 audio CD's soundtrack with game music
Hardcover artbook featuring over 50 pages of concept art from the game

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Collector's Edition
description: Keep warm with Cartman’s Knit Beanie, enjoy your bathroom time with the Cartman Talking Toilet Paper Holder, or get into the holiday spirit with the Cartman Snow Globe. The Collector’s Edition also includes a select set of tarot cards, the original soundtrack, and the game SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! on the platform of your choice.

name: Contraptions Collection
description: Contraptions is a physics-based puzzle game with a fun cartoony look. This game takes 3 games; Contraptions 1, 2 and 3 and combines them into one value pack of FUN!

name: Narita Boy: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Popmoji
description: A casual Suika game-inspired arcade experience where you merge emojis to create even bigger emojis until the cycle is completed! You use special abilities, and battle for the biggest score on the leaderboard while enjoying the juicy visuals and sound effects.

name: Mr. Run & Jump + Kombinera Adrenaline
description: Features 2 characterful games with beautifully illustrated visual aesthetics bursting with vibrant and approachable graphics. Both titles have a wide variety of puzzles and platforming adventures, as well as challenging levels, collectibles, and additional game modes.

name: Hidden Objects Collection 5: Detective Stories
description: Sin descripción

name: House Flipper 2: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Cost Of Bliss
description: Force to spend a month in a psych ward to cure your addiction, you fight yourself going through painful levels of withdrawal. To cope, you make friends with a man who helps ease your pain, in exchange for unsettling favours.

name: That's a Warp
description: A tiny sokoban browser game with a warp mechanic.

name: Caillou
description: Caillou is a Flash game published by PBS on their website in 2007. The game was an interactive minigame collection based on various activities within Caillou's house.

name: Shockwave Original: Sudoku Daily
description: Daily sudoku puzzles in your browser.

name: Choplifter!
description: Sin descripción

name: Congo Bongo
description: Sin descripción

name: Gorf
Jungle Hunt
description: Jungle Hunt offers four unique adventure experiences, which repeat with greater difficulty once all four have been survived. If you don't survive these adventures, you will not only lose your own life but that of the lovely Penelope, who has been captured by cannibals! The first part challenges your Tarzan skills - can you swing on the vines without plummeting to your doom? The second part pits you against a whole bunch of nasty crocodiles in a mighty river. Fortunately, you have a knife to fight back with. Don't forget to go up for air! In the third part, you face a battle against oncoming boulders of varying sizes and physics. Once you've cleared all these treacherous hazards, you still must confront the dreaded cannibal, who is armed with a wicked spear. Can you get past him and save the lovely Penelope?

name: Kangaroo
description: Sin descripción

name: Kangaroo
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last Starfighter
description: A game based on the homonymous movie. It was cancelled on all three platforms, but was rebranded and released for the Atari 8-bit as Star Raiders II.

name: Moon Patrol
description: Sin descripción

name: Pengo
description: Sin descripción

name: Pitfall II: The Lost Caverns
description: This is a port of the Atari 2600 platformer by David Crane to the Atari 8-bit computers and the 5200. It's also known for containing a second quest, exclusive to this version. The game is single player and it involves Pitfall Harry going on a series of fetch quests.

name: Super Cobra
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Nebula
description: You travel to different quadrants in space where you get rid off the invading alien force by fending them off in dogifghts - it is Star Raiders for the TRS-80 CoCo.

name: Panzerkampf
description: Panzerkampf is a team-based 10vs10 players World War II and modern era tank battle game for PC and consoles. You play with historically accurate models of tanks, their armor, weapons and all their parameters. The game includes a full ballistics model with realistic calculations of penetrations and projectile ricochets, an observation/detection and surveillance system, and a physically realistic model of the motion of the tank and its wheels and tracks down to the level of individual track-links.

name: Glitchspankr
description: After a hard day of existing you just want to relax and play your favorite game, Big Booty Slapper 6! Unfortunately, there seems to be a rogue virus eating and corrupting your precious game! Using the GlitchSPANKR Antivirus software, dive into virtual worlds and Spank that Glitch! Or befriend him. Or spare his poor, ugly, miserable life. Maybe give him a smooch... fall in love... Oh, uhem. Well there are a lot of options. Just... get in there and figure it out.

name: Rockman X3: New Year 2021
description: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2021, Year of the Ox.

name: Rockman X3: New Year 2022
description: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2022, Year of the Tiger.

name: Rockman X: New Year 2023
description: A small hack to celebrate the Chinese New Year 2023, Year of the Rabbit.

name: Space Invaders
description: Sin descripción

name: Star Trek: Strategic Operations Simulator
description: Star Trek: Strategic Operations Simulator is an arcade action game where you take control of the Starship Enterprise. Your mission is to save the Federation from NOMAD! Before you get a chance at destroying NOMAD, you'll have to battle your way through ten levels (each consisting of multiple rounds). In each round you may encounter Klingon fighters, deadly anti-matter saucers, asteroid fields, and deadly meteors, all of which are capable of depleting the Enterprises energy. The game ends when your energy supply has completely run out. To fight these dangers, the Enterprise is equipped with an unlimited supply of phasers and a limited supply of photon torpedoes. Each round also contains one or more starbases; if you dock at a starbase, some of your supplies (such as energy and torpedoes) will be replenished. The game is played from two points of view; the top of the screen contains a third person view of the Enterprise (along with the ships gauges), and on the bottom of the screen is a first person point of view

name: Star Trek: Strategic Operations Simulator
description: Star Trek: Strategic Operations Simulator is an arcade action game where you take control of the Starship Enterprise. Your mission is to save the Federation from NOMAD! Before you get a chance at destroying NOMAD, you'll have to battle your way through ten levels (each consisting of multiple rounds). In each round you may encounter Klingon fighters, deadly anti-matter saucers, asteroid fields, and deadly meteors, all of which are capable of depleting the Enterprises energy. The game ends when your energy supply has completely run out. To fight these dangers, the Enterprise is equipped with an unlimited supply of phasers and a limited supply of photon torpedoes. Each round also contains one or more starbases; if you dock at a starbase, some of your supplies (such as energy and torpedoes) will be replenished. The game is played from two points of view; the top of the screen contains a third person view of the Enterprise (along with the ships gauges), and on the bottom of the screen is a first person point of view.

name: Wizard of Wor
description: The Atari ports of the arcade title "Wizard of Wor".

name: Wizard of Wor
description:
Wizard of Wor is an arcade shooter played from a top-down point of view.

The player controls a warrior who is trapped in a dungeon. The goal is to earn as many points as possible by shooting the numerous enemy creatures which wander about the maze like corridors. The creatures wander about at various speeds, may shoot darts at the player, and some even have the ability to disappear temporarily. At the bottom of the screen the player has a radar which can be used to locate creatures that are invisible.

When the the player completes a maze, a Worluk sometimes appears. This creature moves rapidly and will only be on the screen momentarily. If the player destroys the creature before it escapes, the next dungeon will become a double score dungeon and all creatures will be worth twice as many points. Occasionally the Wizard of Wor himself may appear! He moves quickly and can teleport around the maze. If they destroy him, the player will earn a large amount of points.

The game may be played by one player or two players simultaneously.

name: A.E.
description:
A port of the classic computer game, A.E. (Which stands for Anti Environmental) is a most unusual 5200 prototype. It was never announced by Atari nor was it mentioned in any internal documents. A.E. is an arcade style shooting game in which you have to shoot down waves of evil flying mechanical stingrays in order to save your planet.

The Atari 5200 version only has four levels as opposed to ten that the computer versions boast. The loading times for the levels are also longer due to hardware constraints of the Atari 5200.

name: A Mallard's Song
description:
The game’s main mechanic makes use of a timer. This allows the player 60 seconds to find the level exit. If the player fails this task, the landscape becomes consumed with glitching visuals and strange folkloric characters, telling stories of England’s dark underbelly.

The game questions the English nationalistic love affair with politicized traditionalism and the toxic side effects this has had on individuals and marginalized groups.

Through storytelling and allegorical visual narratives, I wanted to explore my difficult past experiences of English nationalism and identity and the history and legacy of English environments and folklore.

name: Astro Chase
description: This Atari 5200 port of the game includes some graphical differences, and notably, makes the game easier.

name: The Tower
description: Climb an impossible tower.

name: The Mouth Of The Woods
description: Search for a friend missing in the woods.

name: Everything You Didn't Get to Do
description:
You woke up on a desolate island up north, and your only company is a talking seal that insists on having you build cairns.

Everything you didn't get to do is a first-person cairn-building game about commitment and validation.

name: Stretchmancer
description: Stretch the world, save the galaxy! In this hilarious 1st-person puzzler, you are THE STRETCHMANCER. Squash and stretch your environment to solve fiendish puzzles and defeat the Claustro Empire in an epic voice-acted adventure inspired by 90s Saturday Morning Cartoons.

name: CopyPasta with Cheese
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Assfuck RPG
description: The game follows the story of a pink-haired boy who wants to get some chips but will need to use the power of friendship to achieve his goal! Follow him in his quest to reach the chips with the help of his friends and try to stop his evil frenemy(?) from ruining his plans!

name: Bez-MX
description: Two countries with an identical layout share one border and go to war witch each other.

name: V de Vinagre
description: V de Vinagre was a web browser endless runner based on an event during the 2013 protests in Brazil, where more than 60 protesters were arrested in June for carrying vinegar as a home remedy against the tear gas and pepper spray used by police.

name: Pathfinder
description: Clear a moving maze of radioactive waste while radioactive contaminated enemies try to stop you.

name: SUS: The Game
description: SUS: The Game is a web browser game that names itself as a "Brazilian hospital simulator" with only one doctor up to treat you. Find them before it is too late! Nobody cares or wants to help you, so good luck!

name: Russki Duck
description: In this espionage game you search for some top-secret plans which a hidden in a rubber duck while enemy spies are hunting you.

name: GalaxyWak
description:
Fan games of "woowakgood"
Year-end contest entries for the year 2023

name: The Best of Microsoft Entertainment Pack
description:
A trimmed-down port of "The Best of Microsoft Entertainment Pack" for PC, including the following titles:

- FreeCell
- LifeGenesis
- Minesweeper
- SkiFree
- TicTactics
- TriPeaks
- Tut's Tomb

name: Ceiling Zero
description: The player has to shoot down an alien mothership which is protected by a power field.

name: A Trans Man's Grindr DMs
description:
From the creator: "This is a curation of Grindr messages I've received. Each of these hold personal significance to me, and I hope that you enjoy reading them as much as I did."

CW: sexual references

name: Tut's Tomb
description:
Tut's Tomb is a variation on "Pyramid", a patience or solitaire game of the Simple Addition family, where the object is to get all the cards from the pyramid to the foundation.

The object of the game is to remove pairs of cards that add up to a total of 13, the equivalent of the highest valued card in the deck, from a pyramid arrangement of 28 cards. When using the standard 52-card deck, Jacks are valued at 11, Queens at 12, and Kings at 13.

name: Proximate
description:
PROXIMATE is a dread-driven narrative game where you investigate a deep sea laboratory and piece together the events that lead to the research team’s demise.

You'll be required to wear an image recognition visor that only tells you the bare minimum information you need to succeed — and sometimes less. Use text information, proximity data and audio clues to form a mental map of your surroundings and pray that your technology won't fail you when you need it most.

name: Obama Alien Defence
description: The world is under a huge alien invasion and you're the last hope. Defeat them and gather as many presidential coins as you can.

name: Mega Man X3
description: The PlayStation/Sega Saturn port of Mega Man X3 adds a new soundtrack in CD-quality and cutscenes in FMV.

name: Mouskattack
description: Pac Man variant.

name: Conway
description:
Step into the year 1791 as a freshly enlisted sailor aboard a merchant ship. You've cast aside your former life to chase your dream of life on the open sea.

With an abundance of free time aboard your new home, the choice of how to spend your days rests solely in your hands. Immerse yourself in the lives of your fellow crew members, delving into their motivations for joining this voyage alongside you, and discover the roles they'll play in your life as the journey continues.

Conway is a relaxed, non-linear and (to our best efforts) historically grounded slice-of-life story. There are no epic battles, no destiny to fulfill, and no swashbuckling adventures under a Jolly Roger. Instead you'll find yourself forging friendships and intimate connections with a cast of unique characters as you sail port to port on the high seas.

name: Alien Lander
description: By controlling speed of descent the player tries to land on an alien planet.

name: Black Survival: Return to Lumia
description: Black Survival is a Real-Time Survival Game, where you must survive by any means out of 10 competitors in a deserted island. Make split-second decisions with a single click! Immerse yourself in the fierce battle for survival; you do not have a second to spare! Search, Craft, Attack, and Run!

name: Snap! A Cerrado Adventure
description: Explore Brazil's beautiful Cerrado region, meet the creatures who live there, and experience a future made possible by conservation and habitat restoration.

name: Decks of the Damned
description: Raise an undead army by night, while by day, fend off human attacks on your lair. Enhance your minions by crafting and looting gear. Discover powerful crafting recipes. Explore lost ruins in quest for rare artifacts. Raid human villages. Shroud the land in darkness under your control.

name: Rally Bike
description: Rally Bike is a bird's eye viewed motorcycle road racing game, where the player controls a motorcycle and must cross the finish line before an established number of competitor bikes. Fuel is a major obstacle, as running out of it results in game over. Any accident will cause great reduction of fuel, and stopping to refuel will cause competitor bikes to take advantage. Competitors never run out of fuel.

name: Computer Foreign Exchange
description: Adaption of Avalon Hill's board game of the same name. Players compete against each other in winning a preset amount of money by trading and selling assets.

name: My Little Pony: Magic Garden
description: My Little Pony: Magic Garden is a cancelled mobile game based on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. Currently only concept art for the game exists online.

name: Cruel
description: Cruel is a solitaire card game based on Perseverance. Cruel became popular when it was published as video game for Microsoft Windows by Microsoft in 1990 as part of the Microsoft Entertainment Pack for Windows 3.0.

name: Dead by Daylight: Gold Edition
description:
Embrace terror with Dead by Daylight’s Gold Edition, which includes the base game and 12 Chapters for a total of 16 Killers and 19 Survivors.

Whether you’re starting your journey in The Fog or looking to take things to the next level, there’s no better starting point than the Gold Edition. Experience a sprawling roster of horror characters in the quintessential Dead by Daylight experience.

In addition to the base game characters, the Gold Edition includes:

- The Clown and Kate Denson
- The Spirit and Adam Francis
- The Legion and Jeff Johansen
- The Plague and Jane Romero
- The Oni and Yui Kimura
- The Deathslinger and Zarina Kassir
- The Blight & Felix Richter
- The Twins and Élodie Rakoto
- The Trickster and Yun-Jin Lee
- Mikaela Reid

name: Tago Akira no Atama no Taisou Dai-1-Shuu: Nazotoki Sekai Isshuu Ryokou
description:
Puzzle game developed and produced by Level-5 and released on June 18th, 2009. It was released as part of the companies "Atamania" series of games, and is the first in the "Tago Akira no Atama Taisou" subseries.

It's based on lateral thinking puzzles by Akira Tago, who also contributed to Level-5's Professor Layton series. The gameplay consists of solving a series of brain teasers, in order to advance to other locations in a themed map. Each game in the series has a different theme, namely: World Travel, Space, Fairy Tales, and Time Travel.

The cover artwork was done by Manga artist Susumu Matsushita.

name: Golf
description: Golf, also known as One Foundation, is a patience or solitaire card game where players try to earn the lowest number of points (as in golf, the sport) over the course of nine deals (or "holes", also borrowing from golf terminology). It has a tableau of 35 face-up cards and a higher ratio of skill to luck than most other solitaire card games. It was included as part of Microsoft Entertainment Pack in 1990 for Windows PCs.

name: Yatagarasu Enter the Eastward
description: Following the success of "Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm," the new game introduces a parallel world filled with fresh characters and meticulously optimized gameplay. The game combines high-quality pixel graphics with a straightforward gameplay style accessible to all players. Key features include a core blocking mechanic, a simple yet deep game system, a live commentary feature, and robust network battle support.

name: Smudge Adventure
description:
Smudge is afraid of storms, he will always run from it! There is a big one coming and he is really far from home.

Can you help him get home safely? The path is full of obstacles.

name: City of the Evil Dead
description: Sin descripción

name: Controlled Climate Chaos
description: You are elf man. You are sensitive to heat score. Try to survive.

name: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco: A Lenda do Santuário - Cosmo Cards
description: Take on epic battles against the Gold and Bronze Saints in an exciting Card Game!

name: Dodge This VR
description: Take control of the only cannon standing between you and endless waves of enemies attempting to cross your line of fire in this absolutely bonkers game. From soldiers in training to medieval knights, this whacky assortment of moving targets will have you in stitches as you blast them!

name: Aeon Nightmares
description: Aeon Nightmares is a story focused horror themed platformer inspired by Cave Story, LISA, Yume Nikki and Haibane Renmei.

name: Rocket League: Game of the Year Edition
description:
Rocket League Game of the Year Edition is a digital download-only release of Rocket League, collecting three DLC packs along with the original game.

Unlike the Collector's Edition, no individually-released cars are included.

It was not made available for Xbox One, as the standard edition was updated with the GOTY Edition DLC.

On 2019-10-23 Psyonix announced the GOTY Edition would be removed from storefronts and no longer sold.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Delicious Foods
description: Jigsaw Puzzle: Delicious Foods is a puzzle game that challenges your puzzle-solving skills with mouth-watering images of dishes from around the world. With over 50 beautiful images and 5 difficulty levels, this game is a visual feast for foodies and puzzle enthusiasts.

name: Taisen Hot Gimmick: Axes-Jong
description: Sin descripción

name: Basket Zombie
description: These guys don't stop playing even when they're dead! Choose between four types of balls and three different stages and make the highest score before the time runs out in this zombie basketball game!

name: Mega Man X3
description: The PC port of Mega Man X3 expands upon the PlayStation and Saturn versions by adding a difficulty select option.

name: From Nava
description: In From Nava, you are equipped with only a seemingly ordinary pen, but it possesses the extraordinary ability to unleash magic attacks by drawing specific patterns. You must escape from this abandoned research laboratory by gathering all the keys and polaroids left behind in the aftermath of an unknown incident. Various monsters and puzzles are all that stand in your way from fulfilling a stranger's final wish and unravel the mysteries of the world and yourself.

name: Shadow Hawk One
description: 1st person space shooter and strategy game.

name: Survival Raft Simulator: Lost at Sea
description: Master the Ocean's Challenges: Craft, fish, defend against sharks, and expand your raft into a thriving haven in this immersive and unforgiving survival simulator.

name: My Life: Farm Vet
description: They need you on the farm – examine and treat lots of animals!

name: Krispain Hero VR: Roguelite Dungeon Shooter Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Genie Reprise
description:
Take the role of Lula and explore a vibrant fantasy world as she journeys to discover the meaning of the Genie and fulfill her destiny! GENIE Reprise is an atmospheric fantasy adventure told through fully voiced poetry and 3D first-person exploration.

Immerse yourself in mystical towns and the surrounding countryside as you collect crystal shards to reveal the next part of the poem that adds to the Genie’s lore, scattered across 15 chapters that span multiple eras and transform the environment around you. Meet intriguing and enigmatic characters and discover how their stories are intertwined as you seek a final truth.

name: Grimoire Organizer
description:
Grimoire Organizer is a game about flicking books into the bookshelves.

The books come in 3 colors - red, green and blue, with 3 cover designs for each of the colors. Take books from the stack, aim and launch them into the bookcase where they belong! If you mismatch the color of the book in hand with the place in the bookcase, or try to place it where there is already a book, you lose 1 try. You start with 5 tries and the goal is to keep at least 1 try under the timer.

Try a different configurable time - either 52 or 200 seconds!

Good luck!

name: Flying Cat
description: Sin descripción

name: TriPeaks
description: TriPeaks is a patience or solitaire card game that is akin to the solitaire games Golf and Black Hole. The game uses one deck and the object is to clear three peaks made up of cards. It was created by Robert Hogue and popularized as a result of being included in Microsoft Solitaire Collection 3.

name: Starbase Hyperion
description: Turn-based space strategy game

name: Buzz Lightyear of Star Command
description: A PS4/PS´5 port of a 2000 action platform game based on the Toy Story franchise which originally was released on PC, PS1, Game Boy Color and Dreamcast.

name: Divarr
description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeonoid 2: Awakening
description: Classic dungeon crawling gets a block-busting twist in Dungeonoid 2 Awakening, a top-down adventure presented in retro pixel art style!

name: Arcade Archives: Solitary Fighter
description:
GOGOON!
Struggle for No. 1 quarreler in the Violence Fight!

name: Arcade Archives: Mystic Warriors
description:
Tranquil death and rebirth,
GOKURAKU OUJOU on a mystic night.

name: Anime RPG: Isekai Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Alisa: Developer's Cut
description: Can you survive the Dollhouse? Alisa is a Horror-themed Action Adventure game, and a genuine throwback to the golden age of 90's 3D games.

name: 3D Color Labyrinth
description: Sin descripción

name: Medieval Dynasty New Settlement
description:
Dive into the rich tapestry of medieval life with 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement', an exhilarating VR game that seamlessly blends role-playing, simulation, and exploration. Set against the backdrop of a meticulously crafted medieval landscape, the player is tasked with the monumental challenge of founding and nurturing a thriving settlement and then starting their dynasty.

As the protagonist your primary focus will be on the challenges of survival, resource gathering, and the ambitious task of creating a lasting dynasty. Utilizing the immersive capabilities of VR technology, you will physically engage in the construction of buildings, cooking, hunting, and cultivating fertile fields. Doing all of this and much more will ensure experiencing the gratification of watching your settlement rise from humble beginnings to a majestic medieval hub.

Venture beyond the safety of your lands to explore the vast and enchanting landscapes, stumbling upon quests, challenges, and hidden treasures that add depth to the narrative. Encounter characters with unique personalities and stories, that will become a part of your settlement destiny

Notably, 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement' stands as a VR spin-off of the highly successful flat version game, Medieval Dynasty, featuring a fresh map, new quests, and innovative VR mechanics that elevate the gaming experience to new heights.

name: Survival Guide 2
description: A survival narrative puzzle game. A linear game with a comprehensive and rich storyline. Offers three distinct gameplay styles: stealth, direct assault, and strategic intelligence.

name: Esports Godfather Origin
description: Esports Godfather Origin is a Deck-building game simulating MOBA e-sports. You will play a role as team coach and build your team. You need to train players and make strategies in various game versions, beat other teams and finally, take the Champion of the World. Be nobody, or lead your team to dominate!

name: Hisa and Yomi
description: "Hisa and Yomi" is a magical adventure RPG. The protagonist, Yomi, wakes up in the "Tower of Water Mirrors," where time flows eternally. Explore beautifully illustrated maps in a side-scrolling format to rescue your friend Hisa.

name: Imaginary Future
description: Embark on the journey to your envisioned future! In this Japanese-style role-playing game infused with elements of microcosm and yuri, you will take on the perspective of Koushuki, a former gang girl. Experience the profound changes unfolding in the Serbian town through a series of events.

name: Imaginary Future: Expansion
description: This expansion pack features a brand new main storyline, new maps, and new companions. Players will join forces with the enigmatic character Yerl, known as the Oracle, to embark on a journey of exploration and prevent the impending destruction of the underground world.

name: Ming Imperial Guards
description: "Ming Imperial Guards" is an adventure game based on the history of Ming Dynasty. You will incamate as Imperial Guards, explore various kinds of unsolved cases, cooperate to break up the conspiracies of the turbulent ruling and opposition parties.Your choice determines a different path from others!

name: Tragedy in Reality
description: This is a plot oriented pixel style visual novel game. In the game, you will play the role of a young graduate who faces multiple challenges from job seeking, work, and life in the complex modern society.

name: Meguru Dungeon
description: A roguelike RPG in which you explore a randomly generated 3D dungeon, collecting items and aiming for the goal of each level. You are free to choose your character's name, looks, stats, etc. Use more than 50 skills and over 200 items to completely conquer the 10 layers of the Lost Forest.

name: Dungeon Adventure Island
description: A relaxed and casual 2D adventure game with the theme character of a bankrupt miner. A game that appears incredibly childish, with very simple controls that require simplicity, fun, and easy to get started.

name: Early-blooming Black Lily: Hana to Itsuki no Gojitsudan 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Really Dog: DLC
description: Really Dog's DLC. It unlocks 3 contents: Paku Mode, Mini Mode, and the Endless Level.

name: Tsuki no Uroko
description: Set against the backdrop of Lake Mirine, which beautifully reflects the moonlight, this is an adventure story featuring the spirits living in the lakeside town as they embark on a journey surrounding the "Moon's Scale" and the "Secrets of Mirine."

name: Campus Shock Night
description: This game is a psychological horror decryption game, where players need to use a series of props such as lighters, mobile phones, basketball, etc. to find key evidence from the game and piece together a complete storyline.

name: Edge of Death
description: Edge Of DeathIt is a first-person horror survival adventure game. Players will experience various illusions between life and death with the protagonist, and experience a journey to the edge of death.

name: Suibotsu Haikyo no Piano Droid
description: Half a century has passed since wars broke out over land due to rising sea levels. Two shadows walk through the submerged ruins, moving from house to house in order to survive. Along the way, they arrive at a concert facility. There was a woman with long chestnut hair playing the piano.

name: Kong Fu Legend: God of War
description: "Kong Fu Legend: God Of War" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Eternum Dreamland
description: This is a third-person beautiful girl fighting zombie game. Elements such as shooting, changing clothes, and shelters are included. The heroine is a high school student in the countryside, in a constant cycle, looking for her former friends alone, and taking refuge in a small villa.

name: Drift Shooter
description: Drift Shooter is an arcade game. Players control a graphic with a car control feel and collect multiple types of weapons in the scene. By combining and using such skills, they can attack waves of enemies.

name: Endless Immortal Journey
description: This is a casual strategic placement game. In the aerial world set in ancient China, players will play the role of a descendant of the Immortal Cultivation Sect. Travel through the barren continent, obtain various resources, build your sect, and ultimately ascend to the immortal realm.

name: Three Kingdoms Chronicle
description: A real-time strategy game based on the history of the Three Kingdoms. The player can experience the fun of conquering cities, directing the country, and ultimately ending the Three Kingdoms disputes and uniting the world through their own efforts in the simulated historical background of the game!

name: Sword Dance
description: The Chinese style new era game "Sword Dance" is hot! Cute riders take flight to explore the immortal realm, enjoying the thrill of loving clouds and mist. Adventures in cultivating immortality, wielding swords to walk across the world, come and enjoy this exciting time of cultivating immortality!

name: Counter Mark 2 Saga: Seven Sacred Heroes
description: Counter Mark 2 Saga: Seven Sacred Heroes is a 2D tactical strategy game and the sequel to "Countermark Saga Frozen sword." The game tells the adventurous story of a modern-day youth who travels through time.

name: Adventure boy
description: Adventure Boy is a pixel style 2D board adventure game. The character will automatically move and attack enemies, and skills need to be manually cast. Job transfer provides professional weapons and skills, paired with different weapons and skills to create your own professional genre.

name: Game of Fame and Fortune
description: "Game of Fame and Fortune" is a real-person interactive narrative product. You will become a fledgling young director, looking for the most appropriate decision among various difficult "choices". . Is it "starry" or "begging on the streets". Everything depends on your "means"!

name: The Legend of Liu Bei of the Three Kingdoms
description: It's a traditional turn-based Japanese RPG! The game starts with the "Liu Bei" Yellow Turban Uprising, goes through the battle of Chibi, collects Xichuan, and ends with the end of the world as the story line... The overall gameplay is about 20 hours!

name: Vampires and Afternoon Tea
description: Crossing Death and Achieving the End

name: Zipper
description: A sci-fi realtime strategy rougelike

name: Za češtiny ve hrách!
description: It is a retro-pixel arcade game in which the player must transport his ships with ships with Czech flag to the island and the computer or the other player prevents him from doing so. There are sharks in the way, which the ships must avoid.

name: Yokai City
description: Walk the streets of a 1980s Tokyo where humans and yokai live uneasily side-by-side, trying to keep the peace between them in a tale full of love and hate, life and death.

name: You Can Save Everyone
description: A game about anxiety. You Can Save Everyone is a story-driven first-person horror puzzle game. Designed for Arcade Sticks and Controllers. Trapped in a strange facility, solve unconventional puzzles and, just maybe, save everyone.

name: Learn Japanese: Yuke and the Book of Yokai
description: Learn Japanese in this roguelike deckbuilder adventure brimming with Japanese flavor! Defeat yokai with your knowledge, gather omamori, and befriend the local guardian, Myōkun the Tanuki. Embark on your language-learning adventure and have fun!

name: Yupi Road 2 World
description: Yupi, the alien, embarks on the mission to save the Earth, helping humans and armed with his power boots, he must overcome the levels avoiding or using enemies to make his way.

name: Wizard of foam Magic
description: Your task is to destroy all the monsters on the floor, and at the same time not to die, or else wait for the end of the timer counter and manage to survive.

name: Witches Wishes and Whispers
description: Witches Wishes and Whispers is a "Einstein"-style elimination puzzle where you sort ingredients to make potions. Based on the card clues, you must pick the correct ingredients so all the clues remain true!

name: Writer's Rush
description: 24 writers, and you're one of them. Challenge yourself to become the best writer in the world. Write books, create characters, choose endings, team up with rivals, answer letters from readers, and don't let other authors beat you!

name: World War: An Age of Industry & Magic
description: A collectible card game with a setting that draws from historical elements of the late 19th and early 20th centuries such as Spiritualism, the Victorian Era, the Industrial Revolution, psuedo-science and quackery of the time like Galvanism, both World Wars, and the sentiment of fin de siècle.

name: Worldsmith by Charles A. Debczak
description: Worldsmith is a 2D open-world survival/adventure game where you write books to explore unique, procedurally-generated dimensions! Features building, crafting, exploration, mining, and more!

name: Wolf Peak: The Case of Ruth Choi
description: In 1991 Ruth Choi was murdered and it was whittled down to 6 suspects, but the case was never solved. Watch interviews, go through evidence and build your case. A game where you are never told outright who the killer is. Use your own deductive skills to find out, who killed Ruth Choi.

name: World Tour
description: This is a simple and fun elimination game.

name: Wrestling Manager 2024
description: Take on the role of a wrestling company CEO in this immersive UI-based game. Manage every aspect of your company, from signing talented wrestlers to marketing and promotion. Are you ready to build a wrestling empire?

name: Xenomycology
description: Xenomycology is a city builder, tower defense, and metroidvania. You control a colony of extra-terrestrial fungus spreading across a planet, and fighting off invading creatures. Xenomycology also offers a peaceful mode if you only want to grow mushrooms and explore the world.

name: Yard Sale
description: Yard Sale is a charming hidden object game where you assist a family in organizing a yard sale to fund their dream trip to Paris, while also uncovering buried treasures and reliving precious family memories.

name: X4: Timelines
description: An expansion to a 2018 sandbox space simulator. X4: Timelines introduces various scenarios and many unlockable rewards.

name: Yarimono
description: The protagonist's life takes a turn after their partner Yarimon learns the ultra-invincible 'cheat Tackle' Constantly challenging various trainers to participate in the Yarimon tournament, the protagonist unexpectedly discovers the secrets of this world in the process.

name: White Room
description: White room. White light. A white table. And only white intentions. A story that always ends before it begins. But one day the circle will be broken. All you have to do is realise...

name: Whispers of Elysium
description: A former friend needs you to rescue him from an abandoned research station on Mars. Explore the station, engage in interactive dialogues and solve mysteries. What will await you?

name: Whispering Lane
description: Uncover the dark secrets of the abandoned house on Whispering Lane in this psychological horror game. Navigate through perilous twists, where each turn reveals a blend of horror and mystery. Can you unearth the truth before darkness consumes you?

name: Whispering Breeze
description: Whispering Breeze is a fantasy brewing simulation game with different storylines. along with the characters Listen to problems and stories inspired by your imagination. And help them out by serving them a drink or two.

name: Wicked Angels
description: From the studio of GunGirl2 and unloved, another masterpiece by the award-winning game maestro Paul Schneider. Wicked Angels is a gritty, mysterious joyride into unholy cosmic nightmares. Grip what's left of your sanity tight in this descent into the abyss.

name: Wild Angels: Episode 1
description: An interactive visual novel about a mysterious gang who decided to break the law.

name: Wildsite
description: An open-world survival craft game for 1-4 players. Crash-landed on an uncharted planet brimming with plasma, you must defend, survive, craft and build your skills to be able to leave this place.

name: Wild River Run: Map Pack - Sci-FI
description: Add two new locations to your lineup of levels with the Map Pack - Locations DLC.

name: WiccAtriX
description: Wiccatrix is an ARPG with a spellcrafting system that allows the player to create custom spells to use in combat and to solve puzzles. The elemental balance or the world of Terra has been disturbed. Your goal is to explore the lands of Terra and help restore the elemental order back to harmony.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?: Geography II
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme/ Geography II

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: US Movies 80s
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Movies 80s

name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire: US Movies 90s
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Movies 90s

name: Weefager
description: Guide this pink being with the power of the ether in a metroidvania where nothing is as it seems. Infuse souls into objects, create minions to help you, and explore vibrant landscapes with a great soundtrack. Shape your destiny on this captivating journey.

name: Wedge Lock Scaffolding VR Training
description: In the VR simulator, the user will prepare the site, tools, construct three levels of the wedge scaffolding, control the horizontal level of the scaffolding parts, and mark the scaffolding as ready for use. The second member of the team will help with the task.

name: Webshooters
description: Midway City is in a chaos! A new type of criminal needs a new style of justice... Battle for the streets as a hero or villain, on or offline, in screen space or VR!

name: WebCraft
description: Webcraft is a claw machine mixed with open world crafting game in space. Catch resources floating by, craft and expand your base from a single square!

name: Weapon Meister
description: Weapon Meister is a turn-based game focusing on fighting and combining combat moves. Numerous skills, several play modes and roguelike mechanics will make every adventure unique.

name: We Need More Steam!
description: We Need More Steam! is about strategizing and creating as much electricity as possible for a town's people always demanding more!

name: Wheelborn
description: Take control of Arback in 'Wheelborn,' a gripping 3D indie beat 'em up adventure set in a world where the Wheelborn, car-like creatures with a unique lifecycle, face corruption. Engage in intense combat, explore, make narrative choices, and shape Arback's destiny.

name: Whacking Hell!
description: The gates of hell have opened: whack all the monsters before they whack you! Collect their souls, ramp up your weapons and your spells, and become a slaughtering machine in this frantic roguelite top-down 2D shooter!

name: Werewolves 3: Evolution's End
description: In the wake of a horrific military raid on your woodland camp, the werewolf pack has become fractured and divided. When fate brings these disparate parties into contact once again, will your allies be able to put aside their differences long enough to survive the myriad dangers lying in wait?

name: What's Up There?
description: A simple journey but which requires enormous concentration. Will you be able to reach the Light above or will you stay forever below? Fake and true game endings for the most curious players.

name: Where Jellyfish: +450
description: The body is free, with 100 jellyfish. DLC adds 450 jellyfish on top of the original 100. A total of 550 jellyfish. DLC does not include achievements. You only need to pass the ontology to achieve full success.

name: Where is Johnny
description: Johnny still hasn't come home. But where is he ? Who is this Voltaire? Fight to discover the truth.

name: Where Ferrets
description: Search for 100 Ferrets. A carefully hand drawn 4K scene filled with cute characters. The process is short and won't take up too much player time. You can choose your favorite dyeing for the convenience of color blind players. Extremely easy to achieve.

name: Where's the Boat
description: Where's the Boat is a sandbox open world survival game set on an archipelago of deserted islands. Gather resources, craft tools, tend to your needs and travel from island to island in search for a way back to civilization.

name: Break Arcade Games Out
description: What if Breakout was the only arcade game people could make? An open-source game, written entirely on a live stream.

name: Minna no Shogi: Shokyuu-hen
description: A shogi game suitable for beginners who are about to start shogi. The mode is "Shogi game function", which allows you to obtain the official diploma issued by the Japan Shogi Association for the first time by clearing the official league with a story, 200 recording problems, and you can enjoy tsume shogi from 1 to 5 tsume shogi. "Tsume shogi questioning function", "shogi technical term search function" that explains difficult technical terms in an easy-to-understand manner, and "communication battle function" that allows you to play against your friends.

name: Minnie & Friends: Yume no Kuni wo Sagashite
description: "Minnie & Friends" is a game where you advance your adventure while using email. Email is indispensable for Minnie to solve the mystery of adventure in advancing the game. In addition to the main character Minnie Mouse, 10 characters including Pluto, Donald, Goofy, Chip & Dale, May, Jun, and April have appeared. In addition, the original characters of "Minnie & Friends" will also appear! There are 13 types of mini-games in the middle of the adventure, and after clearing each mini-game, you can play any number of times by selecting "mini-game" on the menu screen.

name: Hide
description: Hide is a Survival Horror PC game by Andrew Shouldice.

name: Mizuki Shigeru no Shin Youkai-den
description: One day, the hero gets a mysterious bill. From that day on, he gets caught up in the turmoil over the resurrection of the anciently sealed demons hidden behind the eerie card game "New Youkai Den". The hero travels all over Japan to prevent the demon from resurrection. There are four game modes: "story mode", "fighting mode", "battle mode", and "trading mode". In "Battle Mode" and "Trading Mode", you can play and exchange with your friends using a communication cable. There are 298 types of cards by Shigeru Mizuki, the best youkai painter of our time!

name: Gus Goes to Cybertown
description:
This educational game is aimed at kids under eight. You are playing as the dog Gus who searches the town after his 15 "CyberBuds".

The town consists of four houses and one park. In every house you encounter a puzzle-based educational game. This includes a spelling game, and game where you have to recognize letters to avoid asteroids. Also you have to count the bubbles in an aquarium or recognize and match shapes.

In the park you can see typical clothes and items from different timelines starting at the neanderthals up to spacemen. There are also a few songs included.

name: Gus and the Cyberbuds: Sing, Play & Paint-A-Long
description:
Gus and the Cyberbuds: Sing, Play & Paint-A-Long is an educational music game for children between three and eight. It features six songs (Animal Shenanigans, Down by the Bay, Imagination, The Ants Go Marching, Old MacDonald's Farm and I Am A Fine Musician) with three game modes:

Sing: The song is played and is accompanied by an animation. The lyrics are also shown, karaoke-style, so the player can sing along.
Play: The player can add a variety of icons (e.g. animals, trees, etc.) to the background. When playing the song, those icons stay on the screen.
Paint: The player can use simple painting tools to paint over the background while the song is optionally playing in the background.

name: Aaron Stone
description: Aaron Stone was a Nintendo DS game developed by n-Space and set to be published by Disney Interactive Studios in 2010. The game was meant to be a tie in for the Disney DX show of the same name.

name: Battleship
description: A cancelled version of the board game Battleship for the Nintendo Wii developed by Electronic Arts.

name: Hasbro Toy Factory
description: Hasbro Toy Factory is an unreleased EA game based around various Hasbro board games, including Mr. Potato Head and Monopoly.

name: Mr. Potato Head
description: Mr. Potato Head is a cancelled game developed by Electronic Arts. No details of the game are currently known apart from it's mention on a concept artists resume.

name: Kaiki Sando
description: "Kaiki Sando" is a horror game exploring ancient secrets and yokai in Japan's mountains. Players encounter supernatural events and choose paths at mysterious torii gates, affecting the story.

name: Wall Ball
description: Welcome to the Future, Welcome to WallBall.

name: Watch Your Eggs! VR
description: Experience the thrilling world of Watch Your Eggs! VR, an action-packed first-person shooter game. As Agent Pops, your mission is to protect unhatched Frostwing Penguin eggs from wild Icy Land creatures. Plan your strategy, equip yourself with powerful weapons, and face the wave of furious enemies!

name: WaterMelon Mosikkaeng
description: Combine watermelon and friends to make bigger fruits.

name: Way To Fall
description: Way to Fall is a 2.5D game with retro-arcade themes. You must box and use stealth to escape or defend yourself from any threat... alive?.

name: Weapon Devourer
description: Weapon Devourer is a psychological horror with souls-like and 1930's cartoon vibes, blending subtle puzzles. Battle sentient weapons, consume life forces, dive into the Shield's belly to synthesize might combinations in an ancient world shaped by a mysterious cyberpunk disaster...

name: War Of Castles
description: Lead your own soldiers to conquer all castles on the island! Create your own map and challenge players from all over the world! Play online games with friends.

name: Warship Jolly Roger
description: Jon Munro, ex-officer seeking his family; Alisa Rinaldi, rebel mechanic; Nikolai Kowalski, cunning smuggler; Trace, jailed robotics prodigy. United in a prison escape, they command the Warship Jolly Roger, dodging galactic authorities in an epic space opera game.

name: Warframe: Cumulus Collection
description: Amplify your Arsenal's flair with the extravagant Cumulus Collection. Become the envy of your enemies and fellow Tenno alike with the stunning Cirrus Armor Bundle, Cumulus Syandana, Stratus Pistol Skin and more!

name: Warlocks Deeds: Desolation horde
description: In Desolation Horde, you are cast into a barren world devoid of any structures. This survival-driven variant demands meticulous resource management to stay alive. Periodical waves of ferocious, ever-increasing enemies will descend upon you, determined to claim your demise.

name: VTuber Manager
description: Embark on a management odyssey with 'VTuber Manager', a sim game where you build a virtual entertainment empire. Scout talents, customize avatars, produce content, and make strategic choices to lead your VTubers to stardom!

name: Wake Up: Liminal
description: How far are you willing to go?

name: UFO Sightings Simulator
description: UFO Sightings Simulator is a survival mystery game about shooting photos of paranormal phenomena. Take photos, sell them and buy rations, tools, decorations and more, while discovering the island(s)!

name: Ultimate Match 3D
description: Exciting puzzle game

name: Unbeatable Professional Me With 100 Girlfriends!
description: I started a part-time job with my hard-working personality and earned money to buy gifts for my favorite characters.

name: Uncovered: 1945
description: Immerse yourself in an exiting World War II Story about Hitler Secret Bunker and what does he leave behind, Get ready for a new Jurney of exploration and Uncover the Secrets of the bunkers. Will you be able to succeed?

name: Ultimate Ball: Fire Ball
description:
-Added small ball fire skin.
-Added small ball scrolling effect.
-Contains more challenging levels
-New challenges are waiting for you to fight!

name: Until It’s Undone: Unmastered
description: A forgotten oldie returns with a full makeover. Control some lost idiot by typing commands. Unmake puzzles to progress. Bump into several lovely weirdos along the way. Discover a wonderland of disturbing nonsense and industrial amounts of sarcasm.

name: Urbek City Builder: Trains
description: Build an intricate web of trains and stations to connect your population for heightened productivity in work and science. Link key buildings like iron mines to steelworks for maximum industrial efficiency.

name: Vagneria
description:
Vagneria is a platform game that blends elements of RPG, item crafting, scenario exploration, and village expansion. Here, your goal is to assist in the construction of the village of Vagneria by completing missions for its residents and protecting the inhabitants from threats that may arise throughout the story.

Dive into an immersive gaming experience with randomly generated stages, exciting exploration, building mechanics, and thrilling battles. Get ready to become the hero the world needs!

name: Valkyrie Squad: Siege Breakers
description: "Valkyrie Squad: Siege Breakers" is an exhilarating top-down shooter survival game. The mission is to break through the enemy's fortified defenses and face extreme survival conditions. you will lead this brave squad, utilizing each member's unique skills and defeat powerful enemies!

name: Van Life Simulator
description: Get ready for Camping & Vanlife adventure in Van Life Simulator! Dive into the ultimate mobile lifestyle, renovate iconic vans, and craft your own masterpiece. Hit the road, explore open-world landscapes, face wild challenges, and live the dream in the freedom of van life and camping.

name: Vector Bias
description: Pilot your Vector through hostile procedurally generated environments in this fast-paced action-roguelite. Battle enemies and conquer bosses to reach the heart of the robotic army that has subjugated the earth. Good luck!

name: Veilslash
description: In this action adventure, generate and phase terrain with various tools. Carry a massive communication device to the apex of an alien planet, but don't drop it. It's a long way down...

name: Vincent the Vampire
description: Vincent the Vampire is part cathartic animated story and part point and click adventure. Talk to the locals and collect and combine items to solve puzzles as you travel through this unique world.

name: Virtual Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Jigsaw puzzles based on photos of beautiful landscapes.

name: Troubadours
description: Troubadours is a management simulation game where you lead a troop of artists in a fantastic medieval world. Provide food and shelter, manage all sorts of musical acts, and play their performances. You also deal with the countless situations generated by their colorful personalities.

name: TriviaQuest: Mythic Conquest
description: TriviaQuest: Mythic Conquest is a game where you battle mythical monsters by answering true/false to questions. Utilize unique abilities and progress through challenging levels.

name: Trinity Survivors
description: Choose three characters with different styles to team up and combine their skills. Experience the amazing synergy of three characters. Play two-player co-op online with a friend. Defeat hordes of orcs and achieve high scores!

name: Tricky Madness
description: Tricky Madness is an upcoming arcade snowboarding game with a focus on speed and big air inspired by classics like SSX and 1080. Race down the mountain, explore secret areas, catch big air and perform Uber tricks.

name: Tribe Nation
description: Tribe Nation is a roguelike strategy with real-time battles set in the Gallic Wars era. Lead your Celtic tribe across Europe to a new homeland. Strategize on a randomly generated hex battlefield, adapt to unexpected events, craft, improve, and equip. Make your tribe a nation.

name: Typing Simulator
description: Typing Simulator is not a game, it's the future. Learn to type. Get fast. High scores, leader-boards and speed running, all in VR.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Reptiles - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Twistingo
description: Explore three captivating games in one free package! Bird Paradise, Turtle Bay, and Hummingbird Haven await with an array of puzzles, adventures, and mini-games. Dive into a world filled with challenges and exciting discoveries!

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Furry Friends Kit
description: This one is for our furry friends!

name: Turbo Golf Racing: Buffet Ball Selection
description: A delectable assortment of treats for the food lovers! After purchase, these items will appear in the Garage section of Turbo Golf Racing.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack
description: Bring your railroads to life with this Shimmns-ttu Wagon Pack from virtualRailroads.

name: Transfigured
description: Transfigured is a 2D side-scroller psychological horror game. Humanoid monstrosities stalk you from the dark. Armed with nothing other than a dying flashlight, survival depends on hiding, finding tools, and carefully navigating your surroundings.

name: Trash Top Down Racing
description: Top down 2d racing game. Race against AI opponents in different racing tracks

name: Survive Wall
description: Surviwall is a survival and roguelike game. Players struggle to survive while trapped inside the walls. A secret awaits the players inside the walls. With the changing platform, different challenges and surprises await players every time.

name: Syllogism
description: Explore an open world full of beautiful views and locations, and enjoy a relaxing atmosphere while immersing yourself in unique challenges that will challenge your imagination and logical thinking.

name: Slenderman: Evidences
description: Slenderman is back, and he wants to play. Find 8 pages that have evidence of your innocence and dont look to Slenderman.

name: Tabletop Hero
description: is a roguelike deck-building game. With a variety of heroes and classes, hundreds of cards and treasures, and a rich array of genres to explore, there's plenty to discover. Additionally, card enchantment and fusion mechanics help you build a stronger deck.

name: Tale of BaGua
description: Stack BaGua spells and travel through space and time! Tale of BaGua is a mind-bending top-down puzzle adventure where you guide a Chinese teenager on a quest to recover his family's lost treasure, the BaGua mirrors. Overcome obstacles along the way to unveil the secrets of his ancient lineage.

name: Tactic Boxing
description: Tactic Boxing is a hardcore boxing simulator with ragdoll physics and a career mode.

name: Tails of Iron: Crimson Knight
description: Includes Exclusive Crimson Knight Set.

name: Tales of Old: Dominus
description: The Battle of Brides is over, the kingdom lies in ruins. The corrupt rule, the just die or flee. As one of the defeated, forge your path of vengeance: Master warfare, claim and manage camps, villages, strongholds, become a noble, rebel - live through a dark medieval story in an open-world RPG.

name: Takeuma 2D
description: This is a 2D action game in which you take a boy on Takeuma to the top of a tower. The boy cannot stop because he is on Takeuma, but the controls are very easy. This game is perfect for those who enjoy challenging actions and the sense of accomplishment that comes after many attempts.

name: Tachyon Dreams Anthology
description: Time itself is breaking up, and Dodger, the dishwashing dude onboard Penrose Space Station, is the unlikely fixer. Join the chaos in this 80s-style comedy, sci-fi text-parser adventure as Dodger tackles a cosmic crisis like no other! This version includes all three episodes + new extra content!

name: Taboo Trial: Hildr
description: This content requires the base game Forbidden Trials on Steam in order to play.

name: Taboo Trial: Rossweisse
description: This content requires the base game Forbidden Trials on Steam in order to play.

name: Super!! Card collect
description: You are playing a casual game “I want to spin more gachas!” “I achieved something more by collecting more things!” Have you ever wondered...? Super!! Card Collect is a simple game that focuses on collecting cards by opening packs of cards like a trading card game!

name: Supa Fly Racing
description: Welcome to Supa Fly Racing, a VR Racer where you zoom through various pipe systems and progress through various Championship Cups.

name: Sunset Motel
description: Ready for the transformation of neglected rooms? Ensure customer satisfaction, renovate interiors, design entertainment spaces! Manage your motel in your own style and provide travelers with unforgettable experiences!

name: Sunflower Pie
description: A short story about a parasitic sunflower and her loyal son. Eat everything you can. Enjoy the sunshine. Do whatever it takes to make her happy.

name: Summon Masters
description: "Summon Masters" is a fair online turn-based strategy card game , allowing players to construct their own decks based on various card skills for free battles.

name: Supernatural Shenanigans
description: Supernatural Shenanigans is a 2-player online co-op game where you take on the role of a supernatural detective that investigates dark rituals. Get together with a friend, gather as much evidence as you can, solve puzzles, revert the magic, and most important: survive!

name: Supersonic Bridge Racing
description: A fast-paced racing game where the player controls the track. Fight against Friends on a global leaderboard or in the local multiplayer. Supersonic Bridge Racing is a mix between a flying and reaction race.

name: Supreme Fighters
description: Supreme Fighters is a beat ‘em up combo style fighting game set in an urban fantasy environment . With enough playable characters you are guaranteed to find your own preferred fighting style and become The Supreme Fighter!

name: Surmountable
description: Your ship is shot down while engaged in a space battle. You land on an unknown planet. With your battleship damaged and no way of contacting your mother ship, you must survive on the planet until you find a way back home.

name: Survcraft
description: Survcraft It is an open-ended survival game. Your goal in Survcraft is to spend the night without any problems and survive. You can cut down trees, break rocks and explore the surroundings.

name: Starlight Scouts
description: Pure physics-based rocket-powered fun. Solve puzzles, fly fast, crash hard. Become a Starlight Scout...

name: Steam Trigger
description: A riveting steampunk 2.5D platformer set against the backdrop of the sprawling metropolis. Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing fusion of industrial progress and Victorian aesthetics as you embark on a journey throughout the city.

name: League of Masters
description:
League of Masters is a multiplayer Autochess strategy game.

The game takes you to the distant past, the times when magical creatures lived on Earth together with people: elves, orcs, dwarves, jinns, and many others.

Explore the world of the auto battler League of masters in the PvE campaign mode, join the crusade against chaos, and jump into battlegrounds with new allies in your battle squad! You have 12 commanders and over 50 fighters with unique abilities to strengthen your tactics in the strategy game, defeat your enemies, and save the world from Evil.

Prepare to dive into adventure, flashy battles, and spectacular clashes! There’s much more than just a PvE campaign: raid enemy castles, enjoy flying solo, or take up PvP team fights in the battle arena.

Plunge into the unique atmosphere of autochess, and savor its fascinating story and vibrant graphics. If nonstop adventures, legendary battles, and spectacular victories are your thing, this auto battler is just what the doctor ordered!

name: Dungeons & Dragons: Mystara Eiyuu Senki
description: This is a Japan-exclusive PlayStation 3 version of Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara. It was developed internally at Capcom by the original team, and features more accurate emulation than the worldwide release plus exclusive content.

name: Vividred Operation: Akane to Mayo-tto Operation!

description: The Atari 2600 port of the Arcade title Berzerk.

description: This version of Cute Knight has updated features including several new items, secret bonuses, the "Wizard's Challenge" minigame was entirely re-designed, and all the artwork for the monsters and endings was re-drawn.

You and your ragtag group of gun runners must find and deliver crates of classified military supplies before the enemy can take advantage of their content.

name: Rocket!
description: Build a stronger ship with each play session as you earn resources needed to upgrade your ship and apply stronger weapons. Customize your ship to your play style and tackle greater and stronger enemies as the levels continue in this endless roguelite.

description: A war simulation strategy game which has simulations take place on real geographical locations.

name: TicTactics
description: A Tic-Tac-Toe game played against the computer. Can be played in 3x3, 3x3x3, or 4x4x4 configurations. Was included in the 1990 release "Microsoft Entertainment Pack".

name: Pegged
description: Pegged is a puzzle video game developed by Mike Blaylock and published by Microsoft in their Microsoft Entertainment Pack for Windows for Windows 3 in 1990. It is a video game version of various layouts of peg solitaire.

name: Jigsawed
description: JigSawed is a puzzle video game developed by Tito Messerli and published by Microsoft in Microsoft Entertainment Pack 2 for PC in 1991. The game is a simple jigsaw puzzle, only it uses primitive shapes instead of standard fully-interlocking jigsaw shapes.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Gruntylvania

description: An unofficial horror mod for a castle level in Super Mario World. There are multiple endings for the player to discover.
