name: World of Solaria: MMORPG 2D
description:
Embark on a thrilling 2D pixel art MMORPG adventure. Immerse yourself in a vast fantasy world filled with epic quests, intense battles, and endless exploration.
Very simple and easy to handle!

name: Dragon Ball Terraria
description: Dragon Ball Terraria is a mod that adds several aspects from the Dragon Ball series to Terraria, including transformations, items, bosses, and a new ki system.

name: Soul Harvest
description: You are a very, very good boy trying to help a very tired Death Emissary complete his day's work gathering souls that are lingering in limbo.

name: WordZap
description: A Game Boy port of the PC title WordZap. In the Game Boy version, players can choose between 3-, 4-, or 5-letter words. They can also enable or disable hints, allow or disallow plural forms of words and even choose the level of vocabulary used in the game.

name: The Hundredth Floor
description:
You and your sister get stuck inside of a VRMMO where if you die in-game, you die in real life.

Your goal is to get to the 100th floor and get out of the game alive.

So far the game has character customization, a party system with npcs, combat, a unique inventory system that requires the use of a wardrobe, a housing system, a cooking system, being able to take jobs and a stat points system.

name: Moorhuhn 2: Die Jagd Geht Weiter
description: Sin descripción

name: Doom Infinite
description: A single-player roguelike action FPS for GZDoom.

name: Phonopath
description:
Phonopath is a puzzle game based entirely in audio.

Each stage of the game is comprised of a sound clip and password request. The password lies hidden within the audio file itself, and can only be revealed through critical listening, careful analysis and manipulation.

Phonopath aims to explore the limits of “the audio file as a puzzle medium”. Expect to learn something.

name: StarRupture
description: Explore a mysterious planet in an ever-changing open world torn by recurring cataclysms. Build a complex industrial system to extract resources, produce goods and expand your base. Fight against hordes of alien monsters to defend your base and survive, alone or with friends.

name: Calmed by the Dark
description: Discover a parallel dimension to ours in Calmed by the Dark, a dimension filled with mysteries, monsters, and survivors. Learn how to master your powers and join a group that will shape your destiny.

name: Kim Possible Mission: Improbable
description:
Whenever there is a problem, Kim is always there to solve it. However, this time, the mission is quite improbable. And it will be difficult for Kim and Ron to solve everything by themselves. The tasks will not be easy. The journey is full of obstacles and enemies. And they have to overcome all of the issues that come in their way. This is why they really need your expertise in the field. Become the spy that you have always wanted to be right now!
Solve the missions together with Kim and Ron!

name: Calmed by the Dark: Complete Edition
description: An update to Calmed by the Dark that brings new features and some changes to the overall experience, such as the new campaign: Episode 0 Otherside, where you take another look at the story of Calmed by the Dark, with a new campaign and a different protagonist, the player must once again venture into the mysterious world of Zeitlos to return home; as well as new social events, new constructor mode, and five new endings for the game.

name: Perished World Merchant
description: You play as Red "the Merchant" Hunter, who has to explore a desolate world looking for supplies to use and sell to travelers so that they can follow their journeys and complete their quests. Every trade that you lose means that the chances of that buyer coming back are low. So is up to you to find what they want and to sell at whatever price you want.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Neon
description:
Set in 2046, you play as Tommy Hunter, who works hunting monsters and dealing with problems in the city. His biggest battle is waiting for him!

Calmed by the Dark: Neon is an open-world action RPG where you do missions usually related to hunting monsters. The combat consists of using a sword for melee attacks and dual pistols for range attacks. It is also possible to dodge enemy attacks by dashing.

name: Mini Cookie
description: Mini Cookie is a tech demo where the player controls a hungry bear, eating the cookies scattered all over the screen.

name: 765 Suika
description: A Suika Game-inspired game featuring characters from The Idolmaster franchise.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Aftermath
description: Set 4 years after a catastrophic event, Calmed by the Dark: Aftermath is an open-world action RPG where, in a city corrupted by power, Kadmos has the mission to rescue a girl and fight a horde of vampires that control the city. Looking for redemption, Kadmos must grow strong and obtain more powers as the player decides his fate.

name: PokéMaze
description: Sin descripción

name: Sokomini
description: Sin descripción

name: Gus and the Cyberbuds: Stellar Game Center!
description:
Gus and the Cyberbuds: Stellar Game Center! is a collection of six mini-games divided into four sections:

Clam-o-Rama: a Concentration variant with sea animals.
Create a Creature: The player can choose various facial features and clothing to create a face.
The Write Stuff: the player has to complete a partially written letter by dragging icons on the blank parts. There are no right or wrong choices.

The last section, Melody Madness, evolved around numbered bottles which are filled with different amounts of water. The three mini-games are: - Clicking on the correct bottles (the correct numbers are written out) to re-create a song. Alternatively the player can use the bottles freely to create a new melody. - A Simon Says variant. - Filling the bottles with the correct amount of water in order to match the given music notes.

All mini-games were already included in previous entries of the series.

name: NBA In the Zone 2000
description: It's called "The Zone." Marcus Camby found it in last year's NBA Playoffs. We took it from him and put it in this box. Open it up. Shoot the lights out! New dunking animations. Let it fly with the game on the line! All-new freethrow design - don't brick it! All-new camera angles! Smooth animations and jump shots!

name: Calmed by the Dark: Purgatorium
description: Calmed by the Dark: Purgatorium is a dark-action roguelite dungeon crawler where your objective is to head to the top floor. Defeat the Gods of Infinity to acquire more power and progress further through the tower.

name: Nintama Rantarou: Ninjutsu Gakuen ni Nyuugaku Shiyou no Dan
description: Let's practice ninjutsu (mini game) at Ninjutsu Gakuen! The game is divided into a "training volume" and a "competition volume". In "Training Volume", you can choose your favorite character from Rantaro, Kirimaru, and Shinpei to play the game. Each shinobi has its own characteristics, so let's identify and challenge each individuality! In "Battle Volume", you can play CPU battles and 2P battles using communication cables. The number of characters that can be used increases with the "Training Volume". There are five types of games: "jumping", "gunning", "shuriken", "foot rowing", and "swimming".

name: Nisemon: Puzzle da Mon!
description: The popular 4-panel manga serialized in "Comic BomBom" has become a game! The purpose is to rescue the companions trapped in the mysterious energy hall by Warmon. There are 3 characters that the player can take. Select a "character that can be used as a weapon" according to the situation, defeat the nasty "enemy character" on the stage, and rescue the "rescue character". Since the attack method, speed, and behavior change depending on the selected Nisemon, it is a real pleasure to freely use various strategies. You can also collect the characters that appear in the game as a picture book. Since the back information is also posted in the picture book, you can fully enjoy the charm of the Nisemon character.

name: Calmed by the Dark RE:iterate
description: Across the city, people are being mysteriously kidnapped and they are never seen again. Eve, the protagonist, was just looking for a job and somehow ended up discovering a strange world where she awakens her powers and learns the truth behind the kidnappings...

name: Nobunaga no Yabou Game Boy Ban 2
description: The warlords start moving lively! A masterpiece depicting the Sengoku period is powered up! Now is the time to fulfill the great ambitions of Nobunaga Oda, who has been scattered in the midst of his ambitions by making full use of his unique warlords and doing his best in strategy and tactics! "Nobunaga's Ambition: Sengoku Gunyuden" is now available on Game Boy! !! The scenario is equipped with two episodes, "Gunyu Wari" in 1560 and "Nobunaga's Ambition" in 1582. There are more than 400 warlords. Equipped with "field battle" and "siege battle" modes.

name: Calmed by the Dark In:Finity
description:
Set XXXX years in the future, a woman wakes up in a cyber world with no humans in sight, she begins her quest to search for other survivors and understand what is happening in this new reality.

Explore dungeons, collect monsters, and uncover what happened to mankind in In:Finity.

name: Insanis: The 2D Cube Puzzle
description:
Insanis is a 2D cube puzzle for those who truly like a challenge! To solve the puzzle, one must be able to look at the 6 cube panels and convert them into a 3D cube in their mind.
Game is free with NO ads. A online playable version is available at gx.games

name: Ash Echoes
description: Ash Echoes is a Real-time Sci-Fi Tactical RPG. As the Chief Officer of S.E.E.D., you will encounter otherworld Visitors uniting to fend off unprecedented threats and uncover the origins of the turmoil.

developers.name: 上海烛龙信息科技有限公司

name: Ojarumaru: Mitsunegai Jinja no Ennichi de Ojaru!
description: Turn the fun of the festival into a mini game. If you get a high score in a mini game, you will get a Menko card. Collected Enco Cards can be used to play against friends or exchange Menco. The modes are "Kin-chan's goldfish scooping", "Mike's relaxing quoits", "Sachiyo Usui's yo-yo fishing", "Tommy grandpa's shooting", "Ken's octopus grilling", "Haunted mansion captain's haunted mansion", "Poverty god and twin dog mini" "Golf", "Cold Sai and Ko-chan's fortune-telling", and "Menko card game" are available. Fortune-telling can be printed out with a pocket printer.

name: Ojarumaru: Tsukiyo ga Ike no Takaramono
description: A game of the popular NHK educational anime "Ojarumaru". There are 3 modes: "Tabi-dachi niru (single-player mode)", "Tokukun-itashimasu (mini-game mode)", and "Welcome to me (two-player battle mode)". Set in Moonlight Town, the game is played in a sugoroku format, collecting items placed in each square, playing against each other in a mini game, and more when one of them finishes at the pond. The one who collects the points of is the winner.

name: Pachi Pachi Pachi-Slot: New Pulsar-hen
description: Pachislot "New Pulser" simulation game. In the "research mode" that completely reproduces the actual pachislot "New Pulser", you can freely change the speed of reel rotation, set values, whether or not a flag is established, etc., and you can mark any pattern to make it easier to press. It has a "push marker" function. In "Story Mode" where the story progresses with pachislot, the purpose is to defeat the Pachislot Great Demon King who aims to conquer the pachislot world in a bonus city where people who cannot live without pachislot live.

name: Halloweens
description: Hecate's bag of Halloween candy was taken by Saetn! Help Hecate get the bag back by safely navigating her through the lair of Saetn! Collect keys to open doors and wands to smack ghosts!

name: Resurgence of the Storm
description: Resurgence of the Storm is a Starcraft 2 arcade map that is currently being developed by zeroLamberg inside the Starcraft 2 Galaxy Editor. It is designed as a successor/recreation for Heroes of the Storm. It launched with 15 playable heroes, most of which are redesigned versions of their Heroes counterparts.

name: Stones
description: Stones is a game developed by Michael C. Miller and released in 1991 as part of Microsoft's Windows Entertainment Pack. The object is to place 90 tiles, or "stones", on a board. A tile can only be placed if it shares two of three attributes - background color, character color, or character shape - with every adjacent tile. Wild tiles may be placed anywhere regardless of attributes. The game is won when all tiles are placed or when there are no valid spaces to place the next tile.

name: Klotski
description: Klotski is an ancient Polish game that provides mathematical problems in the form of a small wooden game board with various sized blocks. The object of the computer game is to free the "master block," in as few moves as possible. The computer scores you on the number of moves it takes to solve a puzzle. 24 puzzles are included, as well as a puzzle editor.

name: LifeGenesis
description: The object of the game is to remove all the red cells from the grid. The computer will try to remove all the blue squares. You and the computer take turns adding and deleting cells.

name: Chess
description: An early computer iteration of Chess for Windows, released as part of Microsoft Entertainment Pack 4.

name: Go Figure!
description: In "Go Figure!", the player is given a selection of four numbers and they must use addition, subtraction, multiplication and division to devise a calculation that will match a target number. The player scores points for every equation they solve within the game's time limit. There are skill levels, a hint function and a high score table.

name: Tic Tac Drop
description: Tic Tac Drop is a puzzle video game developed and published by Microsoft in the Microsoft Entertainment Pack 4 for Windows 3 in 1992. The game is a rendition of Connect Four but with several additional features like the ability to customize the size and shape of the play field as well as the length of line needed to win.

name: Dr. Black Jack
description: Dr. Black Jack is a computer game featured in the Microsoft Entertainment Pack for Windows. It is based on the popular card game Blackjack (aka Pontoon, 21 etc.). The minimum bet is 10 points per deal.

name: Super Sketcher
description: When a person starts doodling during math class, one of his sketches comes to life. The player must guide the sketch through obstacle courses quickly.

name: Incremental Adventures
description: A minimalistic Idle game where combat is fully automated.

name: Nakayoshi Cooking Series 1: Oishii Cake Okusan
description: Sin descripción

name: Maxwell's Maniac
description: Maxwell's Maniac is a computer game originally part of the Microsoft Entertainment Pack series. Loosely based on the concept of the Maxwell's Demon thought experiment, the object of the game is to separate the red and blue molecules into their respective color-coded chambers using a sliding door. It is superficially similar to JezzBall in layout.

name: Planet of the Apes
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Estate: Assignment Anya
description: A whole new campaign accessible from the get-go, inspired by classic survival horror games and set prior to the events of the main game. Play as Anya, a fledgling actress who finds herself helplessly lost in the mansion after her film crew is attacked by the undead. Abandoned by her leading man and left alone with nothing but a mask to disguise herself with, Anya must escape the increasingly warped and deadly estate all on her own.

name: Crash Team Rumble
description: Crash Team Rumble is a promotional tie-in game by McDonald's made as a part of their Crash Team Rumble Happy Meal campaign.

name: Twerk Race 3D
description: Meet Twerk Race 3D—an exciting runner featuring a fun race where your goal is to build your muscles to become a twerking legend! Run, overcome various obstacles, and fight for the title of the best twerk dancer in history in this super exciting runner.

name: Dance Hero: More Jiggle
description: Dance Hero: More Jiggle is a Dance/Rhythm/Twerk and Customization Simulator with many unique features. Twerk through the story, hire many interesting characters to dance with, explore a huge city and even customize your main character with clothes from real-world fashion brands!

name: Tsuki Adventure 2
description: The sequel to the smash hit pocket bunny’s adventure has arrived! Embark on a new journey out from the Japanese forests and countryside vistas of Mushroom Village and into the unknown! In this new episode of the beloved rabbit’s tale, follow Tsuki along the winding path as he explores the enchanting groves of the kawaii world. Immerse yourself in the charming aesthetic of a kinder world, where furry friends, thrilling mysteries, and fulfilling choices await.

name: Augustus: Im Auftrag des Kaisers
description:
Augustus: Im Auftrag des Kaisers is a licensed game based on the TV movie Imperium: Augustus. The player takes the role of gladiator Titus Gladius who has to rescue Rome from insurgents. Since he is outnumbered, he mainly uses stealth to avoid his enemies or kill them unnoticed. Similar to Thief: The Dark Project, the player uses shadows and a light meter to his advantage. Light sources can't be extinguished.

When there is no way around the guards, the player also has the possibility to distract them with a coin or to kill them with one of his five weapons (e.g. throwing spear or sword). The fights are action oriented, the player can only stab or block. There are also switch puzzles to solve. The game features eleven missions with cutscenes taken from the movie.

name: Kissoro
description: Kissoro is a strategic African board game. It belongs to the Mancala family of board games and has been played for centuries in almost all African countries. The mechanisms are similar to those in the Go.

name: Kunoichi: Sword of the Assassin
description: Sin descripción

description: Galaxian clone for the TRS-80.

description: Head-On clone.

description: Winding Heat is an arcade racing game released by Konami in 1996. It is the sequel to Road Fighter and Midnight Run.

name: Moorhuhn X
description:
Chickens are on the loose! Hiding, running, fishing, and flying - chickens are everywhere! It's up to you and your dead-eye aim to save the farm.

Moorhuhn X is back - also known as Crazy Chicken X and Chicken Hunter. The number 1 classic among the Moorhuhn shooters brings lots of shooting fun with lots of chickens and just as many puzzles.

name: Super Jolly RPG
description: It's Christmas season and our pink-haired protagonist needs to buy a gift for a friend. Luckily for him, the newest mall in town has just opened! Together with his other friend, he decides to shop there. However, the mall's owner has an evil plan for that place...?! When a blackout occurs and locks our protagonists inside just as they finish buying gifts, they must venture further into the mall to find out what exactly is going on, and how to get back home in time for Christmas!

name: Nightmare Gallery
description: Centipede clone.

name: U-Boat Command
description: Sin descripción

name: Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot
description: Experience a brand new storyline in Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot, set 20 years after the events of Calmed by the Dark Leviathan. Play as AJ, a new protagonist, and face new enemies and bosses, and explore new areas. With updated weapons and enhanced gameplay, Re:Boot takes the Calmed by the Dark experience to the next level!

name: Towelket 0: Maiden Bomb Invaders
description: Maiden Bomb Invaders is a free JRPG made by Kanao (Kanashimi Hocchikisu). This game serves as a retelling of Towelket 5, with a primary focus on the Bomb Maidens from the earlier entries. The narrative takes a slight twist to introduce new plots and characters. As a spin-off of the main series Towelket One More Time, it references elements and features characters from the previous entries. It is suggested to play at least Towelket 1 and Towelket 5 to fully understand it.

description: KinitoPet is a psychological horror experience that takes place through Kinito, an early 2000s virtual assistant. Kinito is able to walk, talk, browse, adapt, and play games as Kinito is like no other with its adaptive technology!

description: Space Impact is a shoot 'em up mobile game that was published by Nokia.

description: Missile Command clone

name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 4 - Koby's Combat Chronicle & Soul Map 2
description: Join the Marines' young hero, Koby, as he endures a journey of intensive special training!

name: Chip's Challenge
description: The Microsoft Windows port of Chip's Challenge is a top-down tile-based puzzle video game based on the 1989 Atari Lynx original. It includes 149 levels (one more than the original's 148). It was included in the Windows 3.1 bundle Microsoft Entertainment Pack 4 in 1992, and the Windows version of the Best of Microsoft Entertainment Pack in 1995, where it found a much larger audience.

name: Pocket Hanafuda
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket King
description: Sin descripción

name: Pocket Lure Boy
description: Sin descripción

name: Misfortune Possession
description:
Bitz, a clumsy cat with bad luck discovers by accident that he is actually possessed.

Let's see if he can get rid of it or become demotivated by his "bad luck".

name: Moorhuhn la Compil'
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Stacker
description: Carefully stack the shapes in this fun physics puzzle game!

name: Moorhuhn: Big Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Koi
description:
On your way home, you find a koi carp struggling on the ground. But when you drop it in your garden lake it reveals as the Spirit of the Pond...

That's the only thing he remembers. Help him regain his memories and, who knows, you might discover something about you aswell...

name: Crazy Chicken Pirates 3D
description: Chicken Island is home to countless perils, hidden extras, and pirates who are by no means willing to surrender themselves without a fight. Point and shoot at birds as they scurry through the island, and plunge bravely into the waves.

name: Jeopardy!
description: Jeopardy! is a conversion of the long-running TV quiz show where the answers are given and contestants must provide the questions. Compared to the Genesis version released a year earlier, the Game Gear version features only about half the number of questions, and replaces the console version's photo-realistic style with a more cartoon-like approach.

name: True Lies
description: It's not like he's saving the world or anything. Oh, yes it is! As special agent Harry Tasker, it's up to you to prevent a nuclear holocaust and stop the Crimson Jihad! Experience all the explosive intensity of TRUE LIES - including never-before-seen secret missions! All the action of the movie mega hit - and none of the romance!

name: WildSnake
description: WildSnake was an interesting take on the Tetris concept whereby players had to guide downwards different sized snakes to make lines. These incoming snakes could be twisted into any shape you desired, therefore eliminating those tricky gaps you always ended up with in Tetris - as long as you could control the slippery slithering blocks.

name: Super Momotarou Dentetsu III
description: Super Momotaro Dentetsu III was the first (and only) game in the series to be released on a Sega console: it saw a Sega Game Gear port in 1995. It's the fourth game in Hudson's Momotaro Dentetsu series of train simulation board games. It plays similarly to Itadaki Street or Monopoly in that the player has to accrue wealth by purchasing properties and making other business deals that are often dependent on the square they end their turn on. The Momotaro Dentetsu model received a multitude of small tweaks and additions in this fourth entry but otherwise plays identically to its predecessors.

name: Pac-Attack
description: Pac-Man makes a rare appearance outside of a maze environment in Pac-Attack, a fun and quirky puzzle game. This unique entry in the genre puts its own twist on established conventions and adds one of gaming's most iconic characters to the mix. The goal is simple: Keep your screen clear of falling blocks and ghosts by lining up blocks horizontally, causing them to disappear.

name: Pac-in-Time
description: The evil Ghost Witch has cast a vicious spell on Pac-Man and thrown him back in time to when he was a Pac-Boy. Only you can save him now. Down some Pac-Pellets and get ready to battle your way through a totally supersonic side-scrolling adventure. Journey through snowy mountains and forests, collect fireballs and bubbles, crunch Pac-Bats and ghosts, swim like a fish and swing like a monkey... and ultimately get Pac-Man back to the real world! Sega Mega Drive and Sega Game Gear versions were announced at CES 1995, but were ultimately cancelled for unknown reasons. A prototype of the Game Gear version has since been found and released online.

name: Arcade Classics
description: Arcade Classics offers three classic Atari titles. It includes the following games: Missile Command, Centipede and Pong (Ultrapong: both Pong and Hockey). All games have selectable difficulty options. They contain a classic mode as well as a SEGA mode in the Game Gear version, which enhances the graphics and adds new sound effects.

name: 5 in 1 FunPak
description:
5 in 1 FunPak is a collection of well-known games for the Sega Game Gear. Included are versions of Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Reversi and Yacht (using Yahtzee's rules).

The game was released exclusively in North America in 1994.

name: Arcade Archives: Cosmo Gang The Puzzle
description:
"COSMO GANG THE PUZZLE" is a puzzle action game released by Namco (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1992.
Make sure to line up the cosmos and containers that fall from above to eliminate them.
Containers disappear when lined up horizontally, and cosmos can disappear when hit by the blue ball.
The key to strategy is to rotate the parts well and create a good path for the ball.

name: Chakan
description:
A Game Gear port of Chankan: The Forever Man for the Sega Megadrive/Genesis.
The game featured an uncommonly dark premise for the time of its release, which saw the home console market flooded with licensed platformers based on family-friendly media.

It is based upon a comic book by Robert A. Kraus and was produced by Ed Annunziata, who met Chakan's creator at a convention and was impressed.

name: The Basement
description: You are locked in the dark basement of a mad professor: Alone with a horrible monster. Can you escape this nightmare in just 5 days?

name: The Bonerooms
description: The Bonerooms is a goofy horror-themed multiplayer game about surviving in a living maze while being pursued by skeletons. Last one standing wins!

name: The Big Blue
description: A rouge top-down bullet screen shooting game

name: Cave Dude
description: Cave Dude is an action platformer, which was supposed to be published by Innovation in November, 1993 but was later cancelled.

name: Slam Dunk: Shouri he no Starting 5
description: Based on Takehiko Inoue's manga and anime, Slam Dunk: Shouri e no Starting 5 has both a story mode and a CPU match mode The player can pick one of four teams for the Slam Dunk tournament. Before starting the game, the player decides what roles the six team members will be and their exact positions in the basketball court. The gameplay shows the players from an overhead perspective, highlighting who is dribbling the ball and the opponent in pursuit. Close ups show major movements such as starting the match, defending a basketball hoop and scoring a goal.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: The Wings to Mars
description:
Version 7.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Fenghuang of Vicissitude (Fu Hua)
• New Story Chapter: The Star Which the Moon Gazes Upon (Part 2 Prologue)
• New Featured Event: Wild Phoenix Chase
• New Featured Event: Realms of Battle
• ...and more!

name: Kenyuu Densetsu Yaiba
description: Based on the anime series of the same name, juvenile samurai Yaiba Kurogane goes on an adventure across Japan while trying to learn the secrets of his sword. The game is made up of mainly platforming levels, with a few instances of runner levels and story-based cutscenes between every part that makes up the level.

name: Kenyuu Densetsu Yaiba
description: Kenyū Densetsu Yaiba is as action RPG with elements of a fighting game. You fight enemies in action-based combat. You can use a variety of moves and special attacks, defend, and jump. There is also a two-player mode, in which players control Yaiba and his rival. The game is based on the anime series The Legend of the Swordsman Yaiba. Yaiba Kurogane has been raised by his father in a jungle, training to become a samurai warrior. When Yaiba arrives at Tokyo to continue his training, he stays there at the house of his father's old rival, Raizou. Later Yaiba meets Takeshi Onimaru, an exceptionally talented apprentice swordsman, who soon becomes his biggest rival. One day Onimaru discovers a trap door leading to a secret room, where he finds two huge statues of ancient gods - Fuujin, the wind god, and Raijin, the lightning god. Onimaru realizes the swords of those gods hold an immense power, trains with the sword of the Fuujin, and becomes possessed by it. He sets out on a journey to find the other sword, causing the forces of evil to appear. It is now up to Yaiba to stop his rival and to make an end to his insane plans.

name: Madden NFL '95
description:
Play exhibition, Super Bowl, playoffs or full season with any of the 1994 teams or all Madden teams.

This time around, you can select whether or not to include weather conditions, new player animations (high steppin', QB slides), a bigger field and over 100 injuries.

Also includes windowless passing, all new Madden-designed strategies and team match-up that shows how your players stack up to the other team in their position.

name: PGA Tour 96
description: The Game Gear version of PGA Tour 96 is the last entry in the series on the platform. It has a different selection of courses, licensed PGA golfers and modes compared to other versions. The three available courses are Sawgrass, Summerlin and River High. The five game modes are Practice, Putting, Driving, Skins and Tournament. Up to four players taking turns on the same Game Gear are supported.

name: PGA Tour 96
description: Here is your chance to experience the fairways and greens you've always dreamed of. Walk the 18th on the TPC at Sawgrass with the best on the PGA TOUR, then pass the field by as you march on to win it all! - Look at the numbers, 5 TPC courses, 5 new tournaments, and 3 different play modes: Practice, Skins, and Tournament. - If you win a Tournament, you win trophies and prize money! - Updated roster includes 8 featured PGA TOUR pros.

name: Off the Wall
description: One or two players bust through blocks in various formations using a paddle and ball, trying to reach an exit located in the center of the blocks in order to advance to the next wave. There are glowing blocks which give you "Power Ups" Xextra ball, Ccatch ball, I invinciball, S slow ball, B bigger paddle, F firepower which allows you to shoot blocks with a gun located in the center of your paddle. You get points for busting blocks, but get more bonus points for blocks left when you reach the exit. This game expands upon the classic Breakout theme in several ways. There are many levels with unique variations, such as new blocks parachuting in to replace the blocks which you just busted, barrier blocks that cannot be busted, moving blocks, and objects which can deflect or place spin upon the ball. If you keep the ball in play long enough, the ball splits in two. In the two-player mode, you only get points when the ball color matches your paddle color. The ball color is determined by the last paddle to hit the ball. This game adds enough twists to the classic Breakout to make for very interesting gameplay. When the game ends you can continue where you left off by adding additional credits, but your score at the end of a multiple credit game is determined by dividing your points by the number of credits played.

name: Off the Wall
description: Off the Wall is an arcade game released by Atari Games in 1991. It shares similar gameplay to Atari's classic, Breakout. Tengen developed a Sega Game Gear port, thought to be set for release around 1993. It was featured in some gaming magazines, as well as Summer CES 1993, but was quietly cancelled with no explanation. A prototype has since been found and dumped. No other home versions Off the Wall were ever released (a PC Engine version was planned before also being cancelled), though a similar (but unrelated) Atari 2600 game was released in 1989 by Atari Corporation.

name: Pro Yakyuu GG League '94
description: The game is a sequel to Pro Yakyuu GG League, sharing many of the features and graphics. Now the number of game modes are narrowed down to an Open Mode, Versus Mode and Tournament Mode and no team editing, just Players Data. There are also new teams for its time, voice samples, auto play, different view perspectives and four different stadiums to play in.

name: Cryzen.io
description: A fun and epic online multiplayer shooter game.

name: Pippi
description:
Pippi Longstocking is a well-known fictional character in northern Europa. She is a little girl that never grows up and lives with no adults in Villa Villekulla, an abandoned house, with a horse (with no name) and a monkey, Mr. Nilsson. She says her mother is in heaven and her father is king of a pacific island. But who really knows ? The original stories, written by Astrid Lindgren since 1945, were adapted into films and television series. Here, is a computerized version where children will discover her little world. First, they'll have to enter Villa Villekulla, by the door, of course.

Players will explore the rooms in the Villa (hall, kitchen, bureau, bedroom, and attic) and solve different types of puzzles (i.e. jigsaw, memory). There's also a book activity where children can choose among three books and start these stories with screen texts that can be turned on or off. Texts are available in twelve (say, eleven because of British/American english) different languages.

name: Poyon no Dungeon Room
description: Sin descripción

name: Poyon no Dungeon Room 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Mangetsu no Yume
description: Mangetsu no Yume is an English fangame made by Sekiranun in RPG Maker 2003. You play as a girl named Aotsuki, who is unable to leave her room because her house is flooded.

name: StarCraft II: Wings of Liberty - Collector's Edition
description:
In the distant future, in the darkest regions of space, the ghosts of the past whisper your name. You are Jim Raynor, a marshal-turned-rebel on a vigilante crusade to bring down the Dominion and its nefarious leader, Arcturus Mengsk. Haunted by betrayal and remorse, some believe you may have given up the fight. But you have promises to keep... and a need for vengeance that’s long overdue.

This special Collector's Edition comes with the following in addition to the game:

The Art of StarCraft II - Wings of Liberty, a 176-page book featuring artwork from the game
An exclusive 2GB USB flash drive replica of Jim Raynor's dog tag, which comes preloaded with the original StarCraft and the StarCraft - Brood War expansion set
A behind-the-scenes DVD containing over an hour of developer interviews, cinematics with director's commentary, and more
The official StarCraft II - Wings of Liberty soundtrack CD, containing 14 epic tracks from the game along with exclusive bonus tracks

name: Puzzle de Shoubu yo! Wootama-chan
description: Sin descripción

name: Qui Qui
description: Sin descripción

name: Race Time
description: Sin descripción

name: The Deepwater Witch
description:
"What wish would you ask the witch to grant?"

In a world ruined by pollution, the oceans have swallowed the lands. Ramil is a scavenger, a lowlife who digs through the trash littering his once idyllic hometown. One day he finds a mysterious girl on the beach. She can't speak, and she says that she doesn't remember where she came from. When Ramil meets her, he is dragged into a surreal dreamscape...but are they dreams or delusions?

As the mysteries surrounding the girl's identity unravel, Ramil is forced to answer a question: What price is he willing to pay to be happy?

name: Oshidashi Zintrick
description:
An unlicensed port of Oshidashi Zintrick/Zentrix, a Neo Geo CD exclusive title, to the Neo Geo AES and MVS.

Once every four years in Asgard, the "Zintrick Tournament" is held. During this time, all four corners of the world can enter and wealth, fame, and glory is promised for the winner. Who among the Zintrick masters will reign victorious?

name: Give Me All Your Love
description: A small MBF21 mapset with castle theme and some medium-to-hard combat. And lots of purple. But sadly without love... maybe you can give it?

name: Dum-Dum Thoughts
description:
Sometimes thoughts are too loud
This is a set of 6 vent-y speedmaps that was made in 4 days. Mostly they're focused on atmosphere, so spending a bit of time on the map while listening to midi after killing the monsters will be worth it

name: Subterror
description: The acidic rain has been going for weeks and your house has started to crumble. You decide to take shelter in a nearby cave, but after setting your foot down in the wrong place, end up far deeper within than you wished.

name: Astral Abstraction
description: Astral Abstraction is an atmospheric 5 episode total conversion that aims to advance the formula of Doom's gameplay, bringing it more in line with the modern entries in the series. The vertical aspect of gameplay is expanded and more fleshed out, and the pace of gameplay is faster. ﻿

name: Flash of the Blade X
description:
Flash of the Blade is a first-person slasher with a high level of difficulty due to its one-hit-kill mechanic. Described by testers as unforgiving, brutal, and thematically on-point, the game has gone through extensive balancing to get it to a stage where it is no longer unfair, but FUNfair.

The game is purposefully light on story, basing itself around a battle between a lone ninja and an Evil Ninja Clan helmed by a diaper-wearing Sumo. Expect to suffer not just due to the game's difficulty, but due to seeing the boss in a giant diaper.
The story effectively boils down to - See Ninja, Fight Ninja, Be Ninja.

Flash of the Blade contains 11 fast-paced, ferocious levels, 5 deadly weapons, and 6 grueling enemy types.

name: Reflections: Nightingale
description: A Short Form Horror Game

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - 8 Popular Squadron Emblems
description: This DLC pack includes eight emblems from older Ace Combat games: Aquila, Wardog, Garuda, Gryphus, and low-visibility versions of each. It can only be purchased directly in Japan (all platforms) and Asia (PS4 and Xbox One); in all other regions, it is only available in special editions.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Aces at War Bundle
description: The Aces at War Bundle of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown contained the base game, the Aces at War: A History 2019 art book, and a steelbook. This edition was exclusive to North and South America.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Strangereal Edition
description: The Strangereal Edition of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown contained the base game, the Season Pass, the Aces at War: A History 2019 art book, a 40 cm diecast figurine of the Arsenal Bird, an emblem pin, and two emblem patches all within a collector's box. In Europe and Oceania, the Strangereal Edition also included the 8 Popular Squadron Emblems DLC.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - F-4E Phantom II + 3 Skins
description: The F-4E Phantom II + 3 Skins DLC contains the F-4E aircraft, the Yellow 13 skin for the Su-37, the Razgriz skin for the F-14D, and the Pixy skin for the F-15C. This DLC was available for free when pre-ordering the base game or purchasing the base game within the first month of release.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - ADF-11F Raven Set
description: The ADF-11F Raven Set contains the ADF-11F Raven aircraft, the Mobius 1 skin for the F-22A, and a set of bonus emblems.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - ADF-01 FALKEN Set
description: The ADF-01 FALKEN Set contains the ADF-01 FALKEN aircraft, the Sol skin for the Su-30M2, and a set of bonus emblems.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - ADFX-01 Morgan Set
description: The ADFX-01 Morgan Set contains the ADFX-01 Morgan aircraft, the Mihaly skins for the Su-30SM and X-02S, and a set of bonus emblems.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Season Pass
description: The Season Pass for Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown contains three aircraft, three missions, additional emblems, and a bonus in-game Music Player.

name: Sink the Fish
description: A promotional game for Crazy Chicken 3, taking place in the same setting as the former. Players simply have to place dynamite anywhere in a lake, blow it up and hope that as many fish as possible float up to the surface.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - F-104C: Avril
description:
The F-104C Avril DLC adds a unique F-104C based on Avril Mead's restoration seen in the game's intro cutscene. No weapons are included, so it can only be used in Free Flight mode.

This DLC is automatically included with every digital purchase of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown, regardless of edition or base game. It was also included in the Strangereal Edition in Europe and Oceania. It can only be purchased for physical versions of the game in Japan and Asia.

name: Snail Trainer
description: A promotional game for Crazy Chicken X, taking place in the same setting as the former.

name: Sink the Fish: Spy Kit
description: An online adaptation of Battleship using 'Sink' The Fish aesthetics, with players being able to duel other users after registering (for a 0.49€ fee).

name: Moorhuhn in Südafrika
description: An updated version of Crazy Chicken Soccer. Specifically, the selectable teams (and thus, the chicken's player jerseys) as well as the background (now savanna-based) have been adjusted to resemble those of the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa.

name: Moorhen Seasons
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Deluxe Edition 2022
description: The Japan-exclusive 2022 Deluxe Edition of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown includes the base game and most of its DLC: the Season Pass, the Original Aircraft Series, the Experimental Aircraft Series, the Cutting-Edge Aircraft Series, and the 8 Popular Squadron Emblems DLC.

name: Moorhuhn: The Good, The Egg, and The Ugly Mobile
description: While taking the story, gameplay and setting from The Good, The Egg And The Ugly, this game features twelve levels with unique level designs.

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - Ultimate Edition
description: The Japan-exclusive Ultimate Edition of Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown includes the base game and nearly all of its DLC: the Season Pass, the Original Aircraft Series, the Experimental Aircraft Series, the Cutting-Edge Aircraft Series, the Top Gun: Maverick Aircraft Set, and the 8 Popular Squadron Emblems DLC.

name: Tanzanite Crush
description: Tanzanite Crush is an adventure match-three game. Swap and match jewels your way, show your best strategical moves to get the highest scores and pass hundred of levels.

name: My Moorhen
description: A pet simulator inspired by Tamagotchi. The player is tasked with caring for a young Crazy Chicken, having to feed and play with it in order to keep it healthy and happy.

name: Nothing
description: A game about doing Nothing
